ValidationRule.description: users shouldnt be allowed to create opportunities on accounts that are blacklisted
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND ( ISNEW(), $Profile.Name = "Standard Ads User Profile", RecordType.DeveloperName = $Label.OPP_RECORDTYPEDEVNAME_DIRECT, ISPICKVAL(Account.Credit_Check__c, 'Blacklist')
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This account is blacklisted. You cannot create an opportunity against it.
